00006 DB::DB(string PathDb)
00007 {
00008     Dbase = new XMLParser;
00009     Dbase -> LoadFile(PathDb);
00010     if(Dbase->IsLoadFile()==true)
00011     {
00012         Pr = new Prefs("config.conf");
00013         Db.resize(1);
00014         vector <string> G;
00015         vector <string> Tmp;
00016         Dbase -> GetTagValues("tg",G);
00017         Db[0] = G;
00018         vector <string>Ttmp,T;
00019         int tru = false;
00020         Dbase -> GetTagValues("entry",Tmp);
00021         Dbase -> GetTagValues("Session",T);
00022         Session = new SessionsStorage();
00023         if (T.size()>0)
00024         {
00025             if (T[0].length()>0)
00026             {
00027                 SessionsStorage S;
00028                 Session->ConvertToSession(T[0],S);
00029                 tru =Session->CheckSession(S);
00030             }
00031         }
00032         if (tru==0 or T[0].length()<0)
00033         {
00034             Db.resize(Tmp.size()+1);
00035             for(int z=0; z<Db[0].size(); z++)
00036             {
00037                 Dbase->GetTagValues(Db[0][z],Ttmp);
00038                 for(int i=1; i<Tmp.size()+1; i++)
00039                 {
00040                     Db[i].push_back(Ttmp[i-1]);
00041                 }
00042                 Ttmp.clear();
00043             }
00044             MaxX = Tmp.size();
00045             MaxY = Db[0].size();
00046             PathName = PathDb;
00047             IsLoad = 1;
00048             if(Pr->GetPrefs("Lock_Session")=="true")
00049             {
00050                 Session->LockSession();
00051                 SaveDb();
00052             }
00053         }
00054     }
00055 }

00060 string DB::GetEntryById(int X, int Y)
00061 {
00062     if(MaxX>=X and MaxY>=Y and IsLoad == 1)
00063     {
00064         PosX =X;
00065         PosY =Y;
00066         DbConnections C;
00067         string tmp =C.SearchConnection(Db[X][Y],*this,1,"");
00068         Dbase->ActiveChangeChar(tmp,1);
00069         return tmp;
00070     }
00071 }
00072 void DB::SetById(int X,int Y,string Value)
00073 {
00074     if(IsLoad==1)
00075     {
00076         DbConnections C;
00077         if(MaxX>=X and MaxY>=Y)
00078             if(C.SearchConnection(Db[X][Y],*this,2,Value)=="NO_TO_SET")
00079                 Db[X][Y]=Value;
00080             else
00081             {
00082                 if(MaxX<X)
00083                 {
00084                     int r = (X-MaxX);
00085                     for(int i=0; i<r; i++)
00086                         CreateEntriesRow();
00087                     if(C.SearchConnection(Db[X][Y],*this,2,Value)=="NO_TO_SET")
00088                         Db[X][Y]=Value;
00089                 }
00090             }
00091     }
00092 }

00094 {
00095     if(IsLoad==1)
00096     {
00097         if(MaxX>=X and MaxY>=Y)
00098         {
00099             Dbase->ActiveChangeChar(Value,0);
00100             Db[X][Y]=Value;

00102         else
00103         {
00104             if(MaxX<X)
00105             {
00106                 int r = (X-MaxX);
00107                 for(int i=0; i<r; i++)
00108                     CreateEntriesRow();
00109                 Dbase->ActiveChangeChar(Value,0);
00110                 Db[X][Y]=Value;;
00111             }
00112         }
00113     }

00115 void DB::CreateEntriesRow()
00116 {
00117     Db.resize(Db.size()+1);
00118     MaxX++;
00119     for(int i=0; i<MaxY+1; i++)
00120     {
00121         Db[MaxX].push_back(" ");
00122     }

00141 void DB::CreateRow(string NameRow)
00142 {
00143     if(IsLoad==1)
00144     {
00145         Db[0].push_back(NameRow);
00146         for(int i=1; i<MaxX+1; i++)

00153 void DB::SaveDb()
00154 {
00155     Dbase -> SaveTag("db","!OPEN",0);
00156     Dbase -> SaveTag("header","!OPEN",1);
00157     Dbase -> SaveTag("Program","MiniDBXML",2);
00158     Dbase -> SaveTag("Version",AutoVersion::_FULLVERSION_STRING,2);
00159     if (Session->StatusSession()==0)
00160         Dbase ->SaveTag("Session","",2);
00161     else
00162     {
00163         ostringstream w;
00164         w<< Session->GetSessionID();
00165         Dbase ->SaveTag("Session",w.str(),2);
00166     }
00167     Dbase -> SaveTag("header","!CLOSE",1);
00168     Dbase -> SaveTag("tag","!OPEN",1);
00169     for(int i=0; i<MaxY; i++)
00170     {
00171         if (Db[0][i].length()>0)
00172             Dbase -> SaveTag("tg",Db[0][i],2);
00173     }
00174     Dbase -> SaveTag("tag","!CLOSE",1);
00175     Dbase -> SaveTag("body","!OPEN",1);
00176     for(int a=1; a<MaxX+1; a++)
00177     {
00178         Dbase -> SaveTag("entry","!OPEN",2);
00179         for(int c=0; c<MaxY; c++)
00180         {
00181             if (Db[a][c].length()>0)
00182                 Dbase -> SaveTag(Db[0][c],Db[a][c],3);
00183         }
00184         Dbase -> SaveTag("entry","!CLOSE",2);
00185 
00186     }
00187     Dbase -> SaveTag("body","!CLOSE",1);
00188     Dbase -> SaveTag("db","!CLOSE",0);
00189     Dbase ->SaveFile();
00190 
00191 }
